summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vibrating Scalp Massager Handheld Hair Brush - Promote New Hair Growth - Provide Stress Relief & Improve Mood - Prevent Hair Loss & Increase Blood Circulation - Hair Regrowth & Detangling Brush
Review Date: 2016/12/02
Store: Strand Maximizer
Product Description: ["JUMPSTART YOUR HAIR GROWTH WITH STRAND MAXIMIZER'S MASSAGING SCALP BRUSH", "Are you a man or woman with thinning hair? Help regrow your hair without the use of any shampoos, prescriptions, or surgery! By using Strand Maximizer's Vibrating Head Massager, you can regrow your hair naturally!", 'ERGONOMIC DESIGNS:', 'Conform to ergonomic designs, the handle is non-slip and easy to grip, saving effort. Long-term use effectively reduces hair loss, relieves headache or dizziness and is stress relief. It stimulates hair follicle cells, nourish and protect the scalp, improve hair quality. Our detangling brush works more quickly and gently than ordinary brushes. Hair massager is portable and compact styling, it is convenient to carry and store.', 'IMPROVE HAIR HEALTH:', 'When the vibration switch is open, the electric handheld massager vibrates massaging and releases the negative ions at the same time. Comb the hair with hair scalp massager while promoting the circulation of your scalp to make you comfortable and improve the health of your hair. Vibrating scalp massager to relieve fatigue, let your scalp relax and improve hair growth, prevent hair loss, dandruff scalp.', 'LUBRICATES AND CONDITIONS THE SCALP, PREVENTING FLAKES AND DRY SCALP', '● Enhances blood circulation in the head and neck● Helps relax the scalp, increasing pliability● Strengthens the roots of the hair and nourishes the hair shaft, promoting new hair growth and strengthening current hair● Softens and conditions the hair, making it more manageable● Spreads natural oils from your hair, increasing luster and vibrancy● Protects hair from damaging effects of sun and harsh weather by improving resiliency over timeReplenishes and rejuvenates dry, damaged hair, preventing excessive brittleness and split-ends', 'CLICK (ADD TO CART) NOW AND JUMPSTART YOUR HAIR GROWTH TODAY!', 'Requires 2 AA batteries which are not included.']
Average Rating: 2.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.9 x 2.7 x 2.3 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'No Model', 'UPC': '806800250788', 'Manufacturer': 'Strand Max'}
Review Text: Trying to change the battery was a pain but once I figured it out I was fine. Delivery package was sealed but the actual brush box was opened.
Review Title: ... pain but once I figured it out I was fine. Delivery package was sealed but the actual brush ...
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KOSMED Uplift Beauty Roller - Face Massage tool with precious Germanium stones by KOSMED New York
Review Date: 2019/01/14
Store: Kosmed New York
Product Description: ['Luxury NYC Facial Spa experience in the comfort of your own home', 'Incorporate our new Germanium Roller into your daily facial routine today! The improved and unique design helps to soften and stimulate the underlying muscle tissues and skin cells giving you a brighter, more youthful complexion! Apply the roller over the desired area for 30-45 seconds daily. For even better results, pair our Kosmed Beauty Roller with your favorite skin care products to aid absorption serum and lotions.']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.02 x 2.72 x 1.06 inches; 7.09 Ounces', 'UPC': '755874113119', 'Manufacturer': 'Kosmed New York'}
Review Text: Just ok- I see no difference after a month of use.
Review Title: Ok
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Segbeauty empty bottle 160083
Review Date: 2019/08/07
Store: Segbeauty
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '160 Milliliters', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Water,Cleansing,Hair Spray,Indoor', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '8 x 2 x 2 inches; 3.52 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-A01-JPN', 'UPC': '612520575953'}
Review Text: This is perfect for misting hair or when ironing.
Review Title: Perfect
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mehron Makeup Skin Prep Pro Mattifying Skin Toner | Long Lasting Pre-Makeup Skin Primer 4 fl oz (120 ml)
Review Date: 2020/06/16
Store: Mehron
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mehron', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Skin Type': 'Universal', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Item Volume': '120 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 2 x 2 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MR190', 'UPC': '885457746714 794437341910 784922812209 764294585185 787734193634 885875161458', 'Manufacturer': 'Mehron', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: Just what I needed.
Review Title: Perfect makeup sealer
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:  
The individual demonstrates a clear preference for personal care and beauty products, focusing on items that enhance appearance and promote wellness. Key patterns in their purchase history include a consistent interest in tools that facilitate hair and skin care, evidenced by their acquisition of a scalp massager and a facial roller. The user exhibits a moderately critical sentiment towards products, often rating them around the 3 to 4-star range. 

Common themes in usage suggest an emphasis on promoting hair growth, improving skin condition, and seeking convenience through ergonomic design. Quality is a recurring preference, with higher ratings given to products perceived as effective, such as a misting bottle and a makeup primer, both scoring above 4.5. 

Price sensitivity is apparent, as the individual seems open to various price points but likely weighs product efficacy and user experience heavily before making a purchase decision. Negative experiences with product functionality—highlighted by frustration over battery changes and lackluster results from the beauty roller—indicate a desire for reliable performance. 

Overall, the core preferences include a strong inclination towards multifunctional, effective, and user-friendly beauty tools that contribute to overall health and aesthetics, coupled with a cautious approach to new purchases based on prior experiences.
